title: Ambisonic Crowds in Motion
description: Ambisonic Crowds in Motion features 58 HD Surround Sound Effects with a large selection of Interior and Exterior moving crowds
longDescription: From 24/96 Sound Effects. Ambisonic Crowds in Motion features 58 HD Surround Sound Effects with a large selection of Interior and Exterior moving crowds. Train stations, conventions, sporting events and more. Recorded with a Voyage Audio 2nd Order Spatial Microphone. Recording locations were centrally located within the crowd for better immersion. Intelligible words have been reduced or removed when possible. Mastered with ProTools Ultimate in 3 configurations: Ambisonic (Ambix 1st Order (Wyzx) and Stereo (L-R) Most tracks are 2-3 Minutes in length with embedded metadata. Tracks are edited to Loop seamlessly. All new, original recordings. Here the demo here: https://soundcloud.com/2496-sound-effects/immersive-crowds-in-motion-712-o2a-stereo
technicalDetails:
• • Features: 58 Stereo and 58 FOA Ambisonic (4channel) 44.1 kHz, 16bit Sound Effects

Number of Audio Waves: 116

Number of Audio Cues: 116

Sample rate / bit rate: 44.1 kHz, 16bit Stereo, FOA Ambisonic (4channel) WAVs

Do Sound FX loop: YES

Minutes of audio provided: 140 Min

Supported Development Platforms: Audio files are compatible with any platform

Supported Target Build Platforms: Audio files are compatible with any target build platforms
